message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit shy of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $95, so I'm offering the product for $102.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not sure if I can quite get to $102.50. Would you be willing to meet me at $98.75?

I understand you're close to making a decision, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm offering the product for $100.50. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
